FWT.content: against Adorno’s “no poetry” > instead, a call for writing, just thought: to be faithful to an other one cannot internalize, categorize, justice to be invented; “a voice of sheer silence,” [Laporte, Une voix de fin silence] enjoins us to begin again tout autre ——testify to what we can neither forget nor recall, a testimony w/out force of verdict or death sentence, to not write risks worst betrayal
